original_text: The name of Amram's wife was Jochebed the daughter of Levi, who was born to Levi in Egypt. And she bore to Amram Aaron and Moses and Miriam their sister.
korean_text: 아므람의 처의 이름은 요게벳이니 레위의 딸이요 애굽에서 레위에게서 난 자라 그가 아므람에게서 아론과 모세와 그의 누이 미리암을 낳았고

sentences.original_text: The name of Amram's wife was Jochebed
who was born to Levi in Egypt
And she bore to Amram Aaron and Moses
